summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented in the frontend (seed data updated to remove BREAKFAST; MenuSection filters out BREAKFAST categories/items from backend data and avoids empty category cards). REQ-3 (backend cascade-delete of menu items when deleting a category) is not evidenced in the provided backend diff (deleteMenuCategory implementation not shown). Diff also includes unrequested additions/changes such as a backend migration module and new MenuSection UI copy (Serving Hours note).

missing_requirements.requirement: When an admin deletes a menu category, also delete all menu items that belong to that category in the backend so removing Breakfast fully removes its items as well.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff snippet for backend/main.mo is truncated and does not show any implementation or modification of deleteMenuCategory(categoryId) to cascade-delete menu items. No other file in the diff summary evidences this behavior change.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a backend migration module and applied it on upgrade.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request any migration system or upgrade-time migration hook; it only specified backend behavior for deleting categories/items and frontend filtering/seed updates.
evidence: backend/main.mo (imports Migration "migration" and '(with migration = Migration.run) actor')

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new public-facing 'Serving Hours' informational note in the Menu section UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requested removing/filtering Breakfast; it did not request adding new menu-related informational content.
